title: Govinda's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Fast food, Take-out
description: Long-running vegetarian lunch spot in the historic center, located on the second floor. Wide assortment of standards such as veggie burgers, gluten milanesas, enchiladas, and Asian-Mex fusion with many vegan options. Serves no alcohol. Non-smoking. Note from happycow: Does not appear to be part of the Govinda restaurant chain.
